description: Dive into "Whispers of Romance in Oia" — a handpicked list of places with quick notes, links, and essentials for fast trip planning and discovery.
title: Whispers of Romance in Oia

places.generalDescription: Nestled in a charming 1912 building, Roka Oia is a delightful gem that captures the essence of traditional Greek dining. Located just a short stroll from the bustling main strip of Oia, this cozy restaurant offers an inviting atmosphere perfect for romantic evenings or casual meals with friends. While it may not boast sunset views, Roka compensates with its innovative take on classic Greek dishes like tomato fritters and grilled squid paired with black garlic aioli.

sources.snippet: Roka – Roka is a gorgeous restaurant that is located in an early twentieth-century building, giving in a very quirky and unique atmosphere. The restaurant is the perfect place to eat if you are looking for a cozy, romantic evening in Oia.
sources.shortName: 10 Things to Do in Oia, Santorini / Oia Guide

sources.snippet: Inspired Greek cuisine with products from all over Greece together with excellent Greek wines served in ceramic creations by Greek clay artists. Simplicity, warm atmosphere, friendly service, good value for money.
sources.shortName: Best 20 Restaurants in Oia, Santorini

sources.snippet: Cell signal was generally good except when I’d turn down into the warren of little alleys (e.g. to get to Roka, Karma, etc.) and then I completely lost signal.
sources.shortName: A Guide to Oia, Santorini (& Is It Worth Visiting?)

places.name: Roka Oia

reviews.text: We went to Roka last night and I had the best Pork Belly I've ever had in the world!!! Followed by a honey ice cream, which was divine!! We sat on the terrace which had a beautiful ambiance. The food was not expensive at all! Really great value! Our starters, mains and desserts were the same price as just two meals across Oia restaurants. Thank you so much!

The pork belly was hands down the best I've ever had. It was crispy with a rich charcoal flavour on the outside, perfectly tender inside, and paired beautifully with the carrot purée. It was the star of the meal.

However, I was quite disappointed to learn that the homemade ravioli, which I had seen listed online as a “must-try,” is no longer available. I was really looking forward to tasting it, so that was a bit of a letdown.

Some small details affected the experience as well. The plates on the table was quite dusty and didn't seem fully clean, which was a little off-putting. On the upside, the overall atmosphere and vibes were great. It would be helpful if, during the reservation process, guests could choose their preferred seating area-whether indoors, at the front, or in a sunnier spot-so expectations are better managed.

As for the rest of the food, the mushroom risotto was decent but not outstanding. We've had better elsewhere. The traditional Greek pasta was okay, and the Greek salad was fresh and enjoyable.

In the end, the pork belly truly made the experience worth it. It's a must-try if you visit.

Roka restaurant in Oia is a truly lovely establishment that immediately impresses with its nice, homely atmosphere. It offers a welcoming and comfortable dining experience that feels both authentic and intimate.
​The highlight, however, is undoubtedly the food. The dishes are absolutely great, easily ranking among the best I experienced during my entire Greece trip. Each plate is prepared with evident care and bursting with flavor. Complementing the superb cuisine is the very good staff, who provide attentive and friendly service. What's more, the quality you receive comes at a very good price, making Roka an exceptional value in Oia. It's a must-visit for anyone seeking outstanding Greek food in a delightful setting.

places.generalDescription: Skaros Rock is a centuries-old castle ruin perched on a rugged outcrop, offering breathtaking views of the Aegean Sea. This long-lost citadel in Santorini is a romantic and secluded spot to witness the mesmerizing sunset, steeped in the island's rich history and imposing atmosphere. Accessible via a steep track, it provides an ideal vantage point for admiring the glorious sunset.

sources.snippet: Take a short hike from Imerovigli all the way up to the top where you’ll have stunning views that set the stage for an epic Santorini proposal. Perched on the edge of the cliff under Skaros rock is the Panagia Theoskepasti Chapel with the iconic blue dome and bell.
sources.shortName: Santorini - Local Lens

sources.snippet: Skaros Rock is certainly one of the popular things to see in Santorini. Although, arriving before sunset will ensure that you ditch the masses and experience the most magnificent views.
sources.shortName: 21 Swoon-Worthy Romantic Things to do in Santorini for couples

places.name: Skaros Rock

reviews.text: Great little hike not for those who need assistance.  It is a hiking trail that is at the bottom of a very steep set of concrete steps.  I would estimate about 100 steps to get to the bottom so you can then transfer to a gravel trail.  I loved the hike and the exercise it was excellent and absolutely what I anticipated.. I will just say that it is NOT for the folks who would need assistance.

Lovely place to go for a short hike of roughly 60 minutes. The views from the rock are breathtaking and best to hike it in the morning (especially during hot summer months) when you get plenty of shaded area on the other side of the rock with lots of breeze thay feels quite refreshing.
There is a lovely church on the back side and lots of amazing view points.

A great hike that is definitely not for those in need to assistance. We walked from Santorini Princess so it was all in all good cardio. From actually starting the Skaros Rock trail to the second church in the other side of the point and back it took about 1 hour and another 1/2 hour for taking pictures, but my partner and I were setting a fast pace.
BRING/WEAR TENNIS SHOES IF YOU WANT TO MAKE IT ARUBD THE ROCK TO THE SECOND CHURCH COMFORTABLY. Lots of stairs and lots of places to go off trail, and even up the rock if you are adventurous. Very beautiful hike!

places.generalDescription: Katikies Santorini is a luxurious hotel nestled on the cliffs of Oia, offering a quintessential Santorini experience with its iconic white domes and caves. The property boasts stunning sea-view infinity pools, three restaurants, and a spa. The modern guest rooms feature private balconies overlooking the turquoise waters of the Aegean Sea. Guests are greeted with wine and fruit upon arrival, and can enjoy breakfast on their private verandas or in-room each morning.

sources.snippet: 5-star luxury boutique hotel with 3 infinity pools, fantastic service, surreal architecture. All suites have amazing caldera viewa and own plunge pools (honeymoon suite has a jacuzzi, too). This is one of the best hotels in Greece.
sources.shortName: WHERE TO STAY in OIA

places.name: Katikies

reviews.text: Outstanding property with excellent staff and amazing food. We had the best time staying here. The views from the rooms and the pool/bar areas are simply stunning. Rooms are spacious and comfortable with an open outdoor spaces to soak in the beauty of Santorini and the Caldera. The included breakfast and the service was the best way to start your day. Can't wait to come back here again soon!

Beautiful hotel with amazing views and the friendliness staff! Enjoyed our suite with a jacuzzi / hot tub overlooking the ocean! Breakfast was delicious every morning. Two pools to choose from. Everything was immaculate, so clean and prestine. Steps away from all the shops and restaurants. Highly recommend Katikies!

Katikies resort is quiet, secluded, and provides luxury relaxation in the center of Santorini. My room had a private pool, although I much preferred the resort pool and spent most of my time there. The courtyard is absolutely lovely, perfect for mid-morning cocktails. The location is near to the historical city landmarks, just steps away. I personally prefer a bit more of a party vibe, but if you're wanting a couple's retreat, this place is definitely for you.

places.generalDescription: The Church of Panagia Akathistos Hymn is a stunning example of Santorini's architecture, featuring traditional whitewashed walls, a blue dome, and a six-piece bell tower. Located in the main square, it offers a picturesque setting for visitors to admire and photograph. The church's interior is said to be equally impressive and worth a quick visit.

sources.snippet: The village is also home to several beautiful churches and chapels, including the Church of Panagia, which is located at the highest point of the village and offers stunning views of the caldera. The church has a rich history and is decorated with beautiful frescoes and icons.
sources.shortName: Oia | Santorini | A Love Story in Shades of Most Romantic Sunset

sources.snippet: The picturesque blue dome Church of Anasteseos is another great photo location. This church is just as lovely but not as crowded of a place.
sources.shortName: The Greatest Things to do in Oia, Santorini

places.name: The Virgin Mary of the Akathist Hymn Church

reviews.text:
This is the church where I had my beautiful Orthodox wedding.

Beautiful church, inside and out.
Very blessed and lucky to have been married in this church. ✝️

We passed by this church while waiting for the sunset in Oia. Although we didn't go inside, we stopped to take photos outside. The lighting and shadows on the church made it a beautiful spot to pause and enjoy the peaceful atmosphere. Very quiet during the off-season.

Came here in late October recently by bus from Fira where the cruise ship stopped.

First things that strikes is the large number of people walking along the alley.
Probably much more crowded during peak summer days.
Anyway it was a beautiful day to stroll about.

Did not enter the church itself as it was closed.
The pebble art in the square outside the church is nice.

places.generalDescription: Perched atop the caldera, MIA'S RESTAURANT SANTORINI offers a delectable selection of Greek and Mediterranean dishes with a focus on traditional recipes, all while providing stunning panoramic views. Guests have praised the warm hospitality and attentive service, noting the thoughtful approach of presenting the drinks menu first to savor before introducing the food menu. The restaurant's evening ambiance overlooking the illuminated city of Oia has left visitors eager for return visits.

sources.snippet: Located in an exceptional spot atop the caldera, Mia’s Restaurant specializes in gourmet Greek and Mediterranean cuisine based on traditional recipes while providing breathtaking views.
sources.shortName: Best 20 Restaurants in Oia, Santorini

places.name: MIA'S RESTAURANT SANTORINI

reviews.text: We had our reservation at the MIA'S right around sunset, and the view was absolutely stunning since we were seated on the rooftop. The service was excellent, and the staff were very helpful and spoke fluent English. We ordered a drink, Greek salad, truffle fries, and grouper. Everything was incredibly delicious and definitely worth the visit.

We visited Mia's Restaurant with a group of friends and I highly recommend it!

Dinner was an absolute delight. The dishes were flavorful, creative, and perfectly cooked, with a clear emphasis on high-quality ingredients. Portions were generous, and each plate offered something unique without being overly complicated.

The service was excellent. Αttentive yet discreet, with friendly and professional staff who made sure we had everything we needed.

The atmosphere was calm and relaxing, with a cool breeze and breathtaking views of the Caldera. Even though the restaurant was full, it still felt peaceful and private. You could actually have a conversation without raising your voice, something that's rare in most busy places.

It's an elegant and serene spot, one of those places you don't forget easily. We'll definitely be coming back!

My wife and I had a great dinner at Mia's Restaurant in Santorini. We had a 7 PM reservation, which allowed us to catch the sunset!

Service was excellent - friendly, professional, and efficient. Dimitri in particular took great care of us. The food was delicious, and the evening ended with complimentary chocolate and dessert wine, which was a nice touch.

After dinner, we walked through the village nearby. Overall, a solid dining experience that we'd definitely recommend.

places.generalDescription: Karma Greek Restaurant is a charming venue located in the small fishing village of Ammoudi Bay in Santorini. Situated right on the waterfront, it offers stunning views of the bay and the Aegean Sea. The atmosphere is laid-back and casual, reflecting the rustic charm of the fishing village setting. The restaurant aims to provide a local dining experience with traditional Greek flavors presented with a modern twist.

sources.snippet: Cell signal was generally good except when I’d turn down into the warren of little alleys (e.g. to get to Roka, Karma, etc.) and then I completely lost signal.
sources.shortName: A Guide to Oia, Santorini (& Is It Worth Visiting?)

places.name: Karma | Oia

reviews.text: Very charming restaurant served traditional Greek food. I tried to make reservation for lunch pretty late the night before. I didn't get the confirmation email in the morning, so we decided to walk in. We were so lucky to get seated immediately. As soon as we started ordering, they got really busy. Service was fantastic. It did take a while for food to come out but its understandable since we were busy. That same morning, my husband went here for breakfast and he loved it.Everything we ordered for lunch was heavenly good!!! My favorites were the Smyrni Style Soutzoukakia and Mastelo Lamb from the Island Sifnos. I've heard good things about their Greek stuffed calamari and really wanted to try, but it was sadly crossed off the menu. Overall, it's a very good place for breakfast and lunch with many Vegan and Vegetarian options. We definitely come back when visiting Santorini in the future. Highly recommend it!

Best meal we've had in Greece so far! Everything was so fresh and the flavor profiles were outstanding. The server was so sweet and food came out quickly and everything was made to perfection. I recommend the following: pita and trio sampler, meatball soup, karma salad, and mushroom pasta. I sampled some of my friend's dishes, which were also divine. I don't think you can go wrong with anything on the menu! And the baklava and ice cream are a MUST!! I would eat here every night if I could!

Amazing experience! We went there on our last day for breakfast and we loved the food! The roasted eggplant was amazing and their corn pita breads are very soft! The Karma Spiced Latte was also very unique.
The waiter was very nice and gave perfect recommendations. 10/10 would definitely recommend ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

places.address: Breakfast. Brunch. Greek Cuisine. Seafood. Cocktails. Wine, 早餐. 早午餐. 希臘料理. 海鮮. 午餐. 浪漫晚餐, Nik. Nomikou 11, Oía 847 02, Greece

places.generalDescription: Oia Gefsis is a rooftop restaurant located in the heart of Oia, offering great sunset views and a nice atmosphere. It's recommended to make a reservation in advance, especially for the upper rooftop terrace. Unlike some other places in Oia, this restaurant provides excellent customer service without discriminating based on appearance or wealth. The food is described as delicious, albeit pricey with smaller portion sizes.

sources.snippet: Gefsis (in greek it means “taste”) has one of the loveliest terraces in Oia with unparalleled sunset views. The food is really good, and the ambience is…just right!. The staff is really knowledgeable and attentive.
sources.shortName: Top Santorini Restaurants with a View (2025 List)

places.name: Oia Gefsis Greek Restaurant

reviews.text:
An Unforgettable Dining Experience in Santorini!

We had the most incredible meal at this restaurant! The dining environment was absolutely beautiful-elegant, cozy, and perfectly inviting. The food exceeded all expectations; every dish was prepared with exceptional quality and flavor.

What made our visit even more special was that we dined on Easter Sunday, the only day of the year they serve their traditional **whole roasted lamb**-a Santorini specialty. It was, without a doubt, the most delicious lamb we've ever tasted! The meat was tender, succulent, and full of aromatic herbs, leaving a lasting impression.

In fact, we enjoyed it so much that we came back the very next day for lunch! The consistency in food quality and service was outstanding, proving that this restaurant truly excels in every aspect.

To top it off, the staff were incredibly polite, attentive, and made us feel truly welcome. This was more than just a meal; it was a memorable culinary experience we'll cherish forever.

My partner and I just shared a magical evening sat at the bar, eating a range of delicious food! We tried a lot and they were all amazing.
Sitting with the staff at the bar was lovely! All the staff here have been fabulous, friendly and genuine. Also super helpful and attentive.
The sunset also gave us a great show!
The atmosphere was calm and exciting at the same time!
Would definitely come back and book a table to make sure we had space again!
Thank you for a wondering last evening of our holiday!

So good…. Best meal of the trip. Get the traditional chickpea stew for sure! The moussaka and seafood pasta were amazing. Every staff member is so kind and go above and beyond to make it an incredible dining experience.

places.generalDescription: Lauda Restaurant, located in Oia, is a beloved dining spot that has been serving locals and travelers for decades. The menu features Greek-inspired dishes with Mediterranean influences, catering to various tastes. Chef Emmanuel Renaut, known for his Michelin-starred expertise, utilizes ingredients from the restaurant's garden to create exceptional flavors while honoring local traditions.

sources.snippet: The “Lauda Restaurant” is situated in one of the best areas on the island of Santorini. The “Lauda Restaurant” is luxurious and is actually one of the leading private restaurants on the entire island. It is the ideal place for having a relaxing and/or romantic breakfast, ...
sources.shortName: Best 20 Restaurants in Oia, Santorini

sources.snippet: Lauda Restaurant – For dinner with a view, head to Lauda Restaurant for unforgettable scenery and even more memorable food. The dishes at Lauda are made of locally sourced Santorini ingredients and are beautifully presented.
sources.shortName: 10 Things to Do in Oia, Santorini / Oia Guide

sources.snippet: There are also several upscale restaurants that offer a fusion of Greek and international cuisine, including the Selene Restaurant and the Lauda Restaurant.
sources.shortName: Oia | Santorini | A Love Story in Shades of Most Romantic Sunset

places.name: Lauda Restaurant

reviews.text: One of the best experiences of my life, the view of the caldera was absolutely breathtaking. The menu had info about the history of the restaurant on Oia and about the chefs which was a really nice touch. The food was excellent, we did the 3 course tasting menu and a bottle of wine. Definitely not a cheap meal but if you're willing to ball out one night it's worth it

Amazing views.  We had the Discovery tasting with with pairing. Make sure you have 3 1/2 to 4 hours.  Top notch ingredients, best wine pairing we had in Greece, excellent service.   Scorpion fish and Croaker fish amazing.  Alex our host was outstanding.  Pricy but worth every Euro.  Only opportunity was timing on dish delivery, it was off at times but minor.

We were celebrating our 35th wedding anniversary and chose Lauda to celebrate. The seating looking over the Caldera is incredible! It is hard to describe how special it is. Be prepared to walk down many steps to get to the restaurant level below. The service was impeccable. We had a six or seven course  testing menu with wine pairing. They start with an on the house plating before moving on to your courses. (They prepared a gluten free menu for me showing my courses to highlight how they modified dishes that contained gluten. The food is presented looking like works of art. Each bite is a culinary experience.

places.generalDescription: Andronis Luxury Suites is a high-end hotel in Oia, offering posh suites with private whirlpools and a dramatic infinity pool overlooking the sea. The hotel's aesthetic embodies iconic Cyclades with whitewashed walls, cave-like quarters, and steep stone staircases. Guests can enjoy romantic experiences such as platform beds angled towards windows overlooking the caldera, heated plunge pools, and sunset wine tastings.

sources.snippet: Ultra-luxury boutique hotel with a heated infinity pool, romantic Lycabettus Restaurant (Modern Greek cuisine, jawdropping views, reservations recommended), and a full-service spa. Elegant suites and villas have outdoor/indoor jacuzzis, cave plunge pools, or heated infinity pools. The top end ‘White House’ sports an infinity pool, outdoor hot tub, and its own waterfall and garden (with dining and butler service options).
sources.shortName: WHERE TO STAY in OIA

places.name: Andronis Luxury Suites

reviews.text: We had an amazing stay here. The location is top-notch, the food was good, and the staff was extremely friendly, helpful, and inviting. From the moment we arrived, we were greeted by the concierge, Giorgio, who was very friendly and offered many helpful suggestions for the hotel and area. Breakfast was delicious, the room we had was beautiful, clean, and quiet. My only complaint is that the water pressure was a bit weak and hot water was intermittent, but otherwise, we had a fantastic stay and would return again.

5 Stars – A Truly Unforgettable Stay!
We had an amazing experience at Andronis Luxury Suites on our honeymoon, and everything from the breathtaking views to the 5 star service exceeded our expectations.

The staff is so warm and welcoming and we especially want to recognize Vasilis F., one of the waiters at the property, who went above and beyond during our stay. He was always smiling and attentive and his positive energy always stood out!  Andronis is lucky to have you!! We cannot wait to be back!!

From the moment I arrived, I was blown away by the breathtaking views and warm welcome from the staff. This hotel truly lives up to its 5-star rating in every way.

The view from my room was absolutely stunning – whether it was sunrise or sunset, I could've spent hours just admiring the scenery. The room itself was spotless, beautifully designed, and extremely comfortable.

What really stood out, though, was the level of service. Every member of the staff was incredibly friendly, professional, and went out of their way to ensure I had everything I needed. Whether it was restaurant recommendations, room service, or just a warm smile  – they made me feel genuinely valued.

The attention to detail, the luxurious atmosphere, and the overall experience exceeded all expectations. I wouldn't hesitate to come back and would highly recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a relaxing, high-end getaway.

places.generalDescription: Charisma Suites is an upscale, all-suite hotel located in the heart of Oia, offering stunning views of the Aegean Sea and the caldera. The hotel features a variety of suites with private plunge pools or Jacuzzis on furnished verandas. Guests can relax at the infinity pool while enjoying complimentary champagne at sunset, indulge in gourmet food at the poolside restaurant and bar, and even enjoy in-room massages.

sources.snippet: One of only a handful of hotels in Oia with views over the caldera and of the sunset, Charisma also boasts cave-style design, an infinity pool, and a nightly champagne sunset event. Each romantic suite offers a private balcony, and all have either an outdoor jacuzzi, infinity pool, or cave pool. Great location near the old windmills, dining, and shops of Oia village.
sources.shortName: WHERE TO STAY in OIA

sources.snippet: But in terms of where to stay in Oia, I spent one night at Aspaki Exclusive Hotel, and two nights at Charisma Suites. Both were awesome, but I can’t recommend Charisma enough!
sources.shortName: A Guide to Oia, Santorini (& Is It Worth Visiting?)

places.name: Charisma Suites

reviews.text: Stayed at the Charisma for my birthday with a friend. Highly recommend - the breakfast was delicious and the views and service were incredible. The staff were so friendly. They even had sparklers and a birthday cake for me. The hotel seems popular with honeymooners. Overall very quiet at night and will definitely be back!

We had the most amazing stay at Charisma Suites. From the moment we arrived, the staff went above and beyond to make us feel welcome and cared for. The views were absolutely unreal !!!

Our suite was gorgeous, super clean, and incredibly comfortable. We especially loved having breakfast delivered to our room every morning - such a relaxing and special way to start the day.

We were celebrating our honeymoon, and the team made it feel so special with thoughtful touches throughout our stay. Everything was seamless, peaceful, and just perfect.

Couldn't recommend Charisma Suites more - it's the perfect spot if you're looking for luxury, views, and a truly memorable experience in Santorini. We're already dreaming about coming back!

My stay at Charisma Suits for our honeymoon was nothing short of magical. The view from our room was absolutely breathtaking, offering a stunning panorama that made every moment special. Watching the sunset each evening was a highlight.

The breakfast was exceptional, with a delightful spread of fresh, high-quality options that catered to every taste. The staff were incredibly friendly and attentive, going above and beyond to ensure our stay was memorable and comfortable.

From the impeccable service to the unforgettable views, Charisma Suits made our honeymoon truly special. Highly recommend for anyone seeking a romantic getaway with top-notch hospitality!

places.generalDescription: Alta Mare By Andronis offers a luxurious holiday experience with stunning caldera views and top-notch amenities. Situated near the Oia castle, it perfectly blends local architecture with modern comfort. The property features a semi-covered swimming pool and an open-air cafe serving a variety of refreshments. Guests are welcomed with warm hospitality, including assistance with luggage and a tour of the room accompanied by a glass of wine.

sources.snippet: Romantic, adults-only chic suites with jacuzzis on balconies. Top of the line ‘Retreat’ suites have big outdoor patios with hot tubs. Also possible to make use of facilities at hotel’s sister properties (transfer arranged).
sources.shortName: WHERE TO STAY in OIA

places.name: Alta Mare By Andronis

reviews.text: Gorgeous location, helpful staff. The views are breathtaking and the team worked hard to ensure our stay was great. We wished we could have stayed longer. I would have rated the room 5 stars except for an issue with a noisy pool pump outside our room.

Best view ever. From checkin to checkout,  the service staff is at your beckoned call. We had issues with our hot tub and they fixed it a and gave is a bottle of wine for the inconveniences.  You wont want to leave your room,  especially if you have to fight the foot traffic in Oia on a day when cruise ships are in harbor at Fira!

We just returned from our stay at Alta Mare. This is one of the most amazing hotels I have ever stayed at! From the moment we arrived, we felt like we were treated like kings and queens. The hotel staff met us at the main road and carried our bags to our room. We stayed in a Romance Suite, which had a private hot tub on our balcony. This hotel is located in the perfect location! Our room over looked the caldera and all of the white buildings. The breakfast that was served on our balcony was amazing. There were so many food options to choose from. Tafil, the gentleman who works in the lobby was so incredible. He always greeted us with a smile and asked us about our day. That man deserves a promotion because he made our experience unforgettable.

places.generalDescription: Santorini Secret Suites & Spa is a chic boutique hotel nestled on Oia's volcanic rocks, offering traditional design with sloped archways and white walls. The spacious suites feature private pools or hot tubs, along with terraces for uninterrupted relaxation. This member of Small Luxury Hotels of the World boasts unrivaled hospitality and style, with 17 boutique suites and two-bedroom villas sunk into the crater.

sources.snippet: Adults-only hotel with trendy suites and one villa, all with spacious terraces, caldera views, and outdoor jacuzzis or private pools. The ‘Honeymoon’ Suite has a round bed, fitness area, and hammam; the villa adds a fully equipped kitchenette. Amenities include a caldera-view infinity pool, small spa, and an award-restaurant.
sources.shortName: WHERE TO STAY in OIA

places.name: Santorini Secret Suites and Spa, an SLH Hotel

reviews.text:
From the moment we arrived, our experience at Secrets in Santorini was nothing short of magical. We were warmly welcomed by the incredible staff, who not only remembered our names throughout our stay but also made us feel genuinely at home. They even carried our luggage straight to our room, which was such a thoughtful touch after a long journey.

Our suite was stunning, complete with a private pool that overlooked the caldera – waking up to that view every morning felt like a dream. Without a doubt, this hotel offers the best view in Oia – postcard-perfect sunsets right from our terrace.

The location was ideal – peaceful and private, yet just steps away from all the restaurants, shops, and famous photo spots. Everything we wanted to see and do was within easy reach.

One of the many thoughtful touches: we had a very early flight, and the staff surprised us with a beautifully packed breakfast box to take with us. That kind of attention to detail really stood out and made us feel so well cared for.

This was easily one of the best hotel experiences we've ever had. Every detail, from the exceptional service to the breathtaking scenery, made it unforgettable. We're already dreaming of coming back!

We had an absolutely incredible stay at Santorini Secret Suites & Spa! The property is stunning, with breathtaking views that truly capture the magic of Santorini. The service was impeccable-quick, thoughtful, and always delivered with a smile.

A special mention to the reception staff, who were among the warmest and most helpful people we've ever met. Every part of our stay was seamless-we didn't face a single issue.

On the day of our departure, they arranged a smooth airport drop-off and even packed us a delicious breakfast to take along, since we had an early flight. The manager personally helped us with our luggage, which was such a thoughtful touch and really shows how much they care about their guests.

Highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a luxurious and stress-free experience in Santorini. We'll definitely be back!

Unforgettable Stay at Santorini Suites & Spa – Luxury, Peace, and World-Class Hospitality

Our stay at Santorini Suites & Spa was nothing short of perfection. From the moment we arrived, the level of service was simply exceptional - warm, genuine, and attentive in every detail. The staff went above and beyond to make us feel welcome and cared for throughout our entire visit.

One of the absolute highlights was dining at Black Rock Restaurant. Every meal was a culinary masterpiece - fresh, flavorful, and beautifully presented. The quality of ingredients, creativity of the dishes, and impeccable service easily make it one of the best dining experiences we've had, not just on the island, but anywhere.

We also want to address a common concern for travelers: despite recent news reports about seismic activity in the region, we've found no evidence of any earthquake damage here. Everything on the island is operating smoothly - the roads, resorts, restaurants, and experiences are all fully functional and completely safe. You would never know there had been any sort of scare.

Santorini is not only as breathtaking as ever - it's also fully open, peaceful, and welcoming. If you're considering a visit, don't hesitate. This place is a true gem, and Santorini Suites & Spa is the ideal way to experience it in comfort, beauty, and luxury.

places.generalDescription: Elinikon Oia Restaurant is a relaxed and sociable spot to enjoy Santorini's nightly light show. The menu offers authentic Greek dishes, with recommended items including octopus salad, vine leaves, shrimps in tomato sauce, and meatballs. It's known for its romantic ambiance during sunset, making reservations highly recommended. The restaurant serves meze, perfect for sharing with a significant other.

sources.snippet: Elinikon – This restaurant is the best place to go if you are looking for traditional Greek food with the tourist prices that are often present in the busier areas of Santorini. Visit this restaurant for a late evening dinner and watch the sunset over the sea.
sources.shortName: 10 Things to Do in Oia, Santorini / Oia Guide
34 Things to do in Oia Santorini That Your Partner Will Love

places.name: Elinikon Oia Restaurant

reviews.text: Nice place to see sunset and not crowded, we didn't make reservations but seats are available in May

It's a nice restaurant. The food was good, the price is average for Oia. The three different dips with pita was good but a little bit disappointed that the shrimps was served without any side, not even a bread. My swordfish was ok.
It was a nice evening there even the weather was not very nice.

The place is absolutely delicious and reasonably priced. I loved everything I ordered. It was one of the great food experiences on the island. The ingredients are fresh and the preparation is authentic.

places.generalDescription: Perched on a cliff in the stunning Santorini, Greece, Andronis Boutique Hotel offers luxurious and unique accommodations. The hotel's spacious suites are individually decorated, some featuring private pools for guests to enjoy. With its classic Santorini-style curves, the 23-suite hotel provides breathtaking sea views and boasts infinity pools or hot tubs in each suite. Guests can savor local ingredients and traditional recipes at Lauda, the hotel's renowned restaurant offering an authentic gastronomic experience.

sources.snippet: Adults-only, boutique hotel with 2 pools (1 heated, 1 cool), the fine-dining Lauda (the oldest restaurant in Oia), and caldera views. Each spacious suite and the 2-bedroom villa includes a private terrace with a jacuzzi, open-air plunge pool, or cave pool. Located in central Oia, near some of the island’s best restaurants, shops, and attractions.
sources.shortName: WHERE TO STAY in OIA

places.name: Andronis Boutique Hotel

reviews.text: Great service and location. The front of desk staff were so accommodating to our needs and very responsive, I would recommend and would visit again. They also made our stay extra special as my partner proposed to me while in Santorini. The staff went above and beyond for any requests/ needs we had

If you want to book a hotel room where it takes true effort to get up and leave the comfort, ambiance, and view of your space, this is the spot. The hotel is located right off of the main walking path in Oia which can be extremely busy, but the moment you walk through the gate to the private property, you step into peace, ambiance, privacy, and the most breathtaking views. The rooms are very private with personal pools, hot tubs, day beds, and more.  The staff was wonderful and the included breakfast amazing.

My husband and I stayed here for our honeymoon, an absolute DREAM. The location is perfect, 5 minute walk to get your photo of the blue domes, and right in the middle of all restaurants and shops. The staff were extremely attentive to our needs and were always quick to help. Reservations each night were made by the hotel for dinner wherever we chose to eat, which made things a lot smoother for us. The breakfast was extravagant, the quality of the food and the amount of options there were was better than anything we had seen before! Our room was an absolute dream with the plunge pool being a great addition with a beautiful view of the  caldera. So picturesque. I would recommend this to any honeymooners!

places.generalDescription: Aspaki Exclusive Hotel by Art Maisons is a luxurious hotel located in a restored fortress, offering peace and tranquility with stunning views of the caldera and volcano. The charming rooms are equipped with modern amenities such as complimentary Wi-Fi, minibars, and flat-screen TVs. Guests can choose from suites and villas with hot tubs or cave pools, including the Cave Pool Suite with chromotherapy swimming pools and Exclusive and Honeymoon Suites featuring private balconies and jacuzzis.

sources.snippet: Art-centric, luxury hotel with 15 caldera-view suites, a small pool, and an organic spa. Honeymoon and Exclusive Suites boast private, outdoor jacuzzis, while Cave Pool Suites feature indoor or outdoor heated cave pools. The hotel is served by a delicious Mediterranean restaurant, and an a la carte breakfast is always included.
sources.shortName: WHERE TO STAY in OIA

sources.snippet: But in terms of where to stay in Oia, I spent one night at Aspaki Exclusive Hotel, and two nights at Charisma Suites. Both were awesome, but I can’t recommend Charisma enough!
sources.shortName: A Guide to Oia, Santorini (& Is It Worth Visiting?)

places.name: Aspaki Exclusive Hotel by Art Maisons

reviews.text: Our experience at Aspaki was unlike any hotel experience that we have ever had. This is a stunning, intimate hotel with 5-star service, beautiful suites and excellent food. Our vacation there was unforgettable and I cannot recommend it more. The unique experience started with men carrying our bags from our drop off point down all of the stairs to the friendly welcome that we received with a fruity cocktail overlooking the cliffs and the breathtaking views of the water. We were greeted and checked in by the hotel manager as we soaked up the beauty of Oia's water. Our suite with a hot tub was superb with a handwritten greeting, sparkling wine and rose petals. We also adored our complementary, hearty breakfasts which we enjoyed either on our patio or in the restaurant area listening to Sade, the sweet waitress's preferred music choice.

We had Honeymoon Caldera view room that has perfect spot for sip white houses and caldera views on your own terrace with jacuzzi.

Welcoming was warm and calm extended with great atmosphere of welcome drink and stunning view from their restaurant.

Breakfast was on the highest level with the best products quality with huge variety of options.

A great benefit to have an option to stay in the hotel after check out to have relax in comfortable shared zone with breathtaking views to caldera and blue domes.
Moreover, all personal do their best to make your staying unforgettable.

Some downsides also exist.

Jacuzzi was slightly colder than expected, but I think it could be a problem only for low season time. Another thing that the jacuzzi was too small for two people to have full comfort. For one, it is perfect.

Generally, Aspaki project is a great sample of perfect hotel that creates only pretty unforgettable memories.

Absolutely the best stay in Santorini. Mariana the manager was very informative and kind in taking care of us, along with the rest of the staff. Christine also makes great drinks for the location! Breathtaking views, kind staff, amazing service. We had wonderful views for our honeymoon and would highly recommend! Many locals also confirmed this is the best place for a honeymoon

places.generalDescription: Domaine Sigalas is a renowned Greek vineyard located in Oia, known for its specialization in the Assyrtiko grape. The vineyard offers a picturesque setting with centuries-old, basket-trained vines and stunning sunset views. Visitors can indulge in food-paired wine tastings featuring Greek salads, homemade bread with Santorini tomato puree, slow-cooked octopus, and local tsalafouti cheese.
places.name: Domaine Sigalas

reviews.text: My husband and I booked the Wine and Food experience and absolutely loved it!! If you are a white wine fan stopping here is an absolute must. The woman who led the experience was very friendly and knowledgable. Learning about the different grapes, history, and processes on how the wine is made in Santorini was fascinating. Not to mention every single wine and food pairing we ate we enjoyed. Sooo delicious. Thank you again!!

A wonderful wine tasting experience. We opted for the a la carte menu and did a wine flight as we had already eaten, but we were watching others doing the tasting & food pairing menu which looked incredible. The setting is gorgeous in the middle of the vineyards with a view of the sunset.

The tasting was perfect - they told us about each wine in detail when it was served. The wines themselves we're all amazing.

The Winery is worth a visit, even if you're not all about white wine. While they're known for their Santorini whites, which are decent and well-made the overall experience is what makes it worthwhile.

Even though white wine isn't my go-to, I found a few that were interesting enough to enjoy, and the reds were a pleasant surprise.

places.generalDescription: Mystique, a Luxury Collection Hotel in Santorini, is an exclusive hideaway known for its chic cave-style suites and villas offering breathtaking sea views. The hotel features two pools, a spa, and a vibrant restaurant by Olivier Campanha. With 41 luxury suites overlooking the active volcano vista, guests can indulge in the personal touch and distinctive Greek hospitality of the owners.

sources.snippet: Magnificent, luxury hotel with 2 sparkling pools located near the base of the Oia caldera, allowing unobstructed sea views and granting more privacy than most nearby hotels. Mystique offers a variety of suites and villas, most with private jacuzzis, pools, or both. Hotel guests are served by 3 delicious restaurants: Lure Greek Restaurant, Charisma Mediterranean Restaurant, and the Captain’s Lounge for breakfast and casual fare.
sources.shortName: WHERE TO STAY in OIA

places.name: Mystique, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Santorini

reviews.text:
From the service to the views, this hotel was incredible! Their use of WhatsApp for communication was incredibly helpful and they were so responsive! Every inch of that hotel was clean and pristine as we walked through. You could see and feel the genuine care provided by staff. Excellent recommendations on restaurants and things to do.
Only a few minutes walk to many, many stores and restaurants!
Would stay here again! A true 5⭐️ hotel!

Mystique is a stunning collection of approximately 40 private villas perched on the Caldera Cliffs. Having stayed at many five-star hotels, we can confidently say this is by far one of the most beautiful. From the breathtaking views to the impeccable property design, it's the perfect place to unwind and relax.

We were celebrating our fifth wedding anniversary, and the hotel went above and beyond by surprising us with a thoughtful treat. The room itself felt like a luxurious private cave - spacious, serene, and incredibly cozy. It truly offered a sense of seclusion and comfort.

While the surrounding area is naturally spectacular, Mystique elevates the experience to pure bliss. Exceptional property, exceptional service. Well done!

Google Local guide Lv 6 here.

I felt extremely privileged to be able to be staying in this beautiful property once again, this is my 2nd time, i was here last year also. It has one of the best prime location for Santorini and the view is just unparalleled on the island. The resort is beautiful! It only has 40 rooms and each one is unique. Throughout my 2 stays, i get to experience a few different room types and literally all of them were great, there is truly no bad room here. Each one is like a mini museum.

Service is excellent as always, special shoutout to Vaios, Yugita and Maria. I had wonderful conversations with them at different points during my stay and they made me felt very welcomed like a friend

This is truly Marriott Bonvoy's crown jewel in Greece.
I hope you will choose this property, at least one night, to experience finer things in life. During my stay, I've come across several families having extended stay here in this resort, like upwards of 5 nights or more.

Excellent property!

places.generalDescription: Canaves Sunday is a hidden gem nestled in the enchanting Cyclades islands, offering an unforgettable experience that goes beyond just dining. With breathtaking views of the Aegean Sea and exquisite cuisine crafted by Chef Tasos Stefatos, it’s an ideal setting for romantic evenings or memorable gatherings with friends. The property showcases stunning Cycladic architecture, featuring uniquely designed private pools that complement its elegant white-on-white suites.

sources.snippet: Small, luxury hotel with an infinity pool and 8 suites with panoramic caldera views. Suites are generous, the largest with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. Honeymoon Suites feature outdoor jacuzzis, while Master Suites boast private infinity pools.
sources.shortName: WHERE TO STAY in OIA

places.name: Canaves Sunday

reviews.text: Had a wonderful experience staying at Canaves Sunday. We were greeted with so much excitement from Michael, that lease is feel so welcomed after a long day of traveling. Michael, John, Niki, Betty and the rest of the staff made our stay wonderful. The property is beautiful! We stayed in the honeymoon suite with a wonderful view and hot tub. The sunrise and sunset are out of this world from Veranda, their rooftop lounge. Sale up early and head up there for the best views. Breakfast and tapas were delicious. They help you set up reservations and anything you may need. Second Canaves location for us within 5 years and we would come back and stay there again. Try Omnia one of the Canaves Epitome restaurants. You won't regret it! Views, food and service are fantastic! Sunset cruise with Sunset Oia cruise is also a must!

Canaves Sunday was the perfect finale to our Greek getaway.
We spent 3 nights in total bliss-upgraded to the honeymoon suite, with a beautifully appointed room and a veranda view that made breakfast feel like a dream. The secluded location and serene pool overlooking the caldera offered the peace and luxury we were craving. Every staff member was warm and welcoming, and the service was flawless. Yes, it's priced for the views-but the experience? Worth every euro. Ending our trip in Oia was pure magic.

We stayed at Canaves from 7 May 2025. The Manager was John he was so kind and so exceptional he and his staff went above and beyond to make us happy during our stay. We loved everything about Canaves Sunday the views from this hotel could not be matched by any other place in the world and I have travelled to 32 countries.

John helped us with everything suitcases, information about where to get the best authentic Greek food anything and everything we enquired about he always gave us the best information. He was always welcoming and so kind. All of his staff were outstanding at their jobs as well. Everything was perfect. It was like living in a dream 24/7. We absolutely loved Canaves Sunday and will never forget John and the other staff who made our stay unforgetable for ever

places.generalDescription: Located in Firostefani on the beautiful Santorini island, Remvi Restaurant offers a stunning panoramic terrace and excellent Greek-inspired cuisine. With its breathtaking views, it's perfect for a romantic dinner or a leisurely lunch. The restaurant is popular, so making reservations in advance during the summer season is highly recommended.

sources.snippet: Remvi has one of the loveliest terraces on the island, and it’s very well known for its excellent food even in the busiest of times. You definitely have to book well in advance as in the summer the restaurant gets extremely busy. The food itself is mainly inspired by greek cuisine and Remvi is also a great option for a lunch during the day.
sources.shortName: Top Santorini Restaurants with a View (2025 List)

places.name: Remvi Restaurant Santorini

reviews.text: I had an unforgettable dining experience at this restaurant. The view was absolutely stunning - the perfect backdrop for a relaxing evening. The food was exceptional, with every dish prepared to perfection and full of flavor. On top of that, the staff was incredibly polite, attentive, and made us feel welcome from the moment we arrived. It's rare to find a place that combines great food, a beautiful atmosphere, and outstanding service so effortlessly. Highly recommended!

We were convinced to eat here on our last night by the guy at the front desk, a lovely guy but a very good salesman. Recommended the beef (only dish without a price on it) which we later found out was €55 and of very poor quality compared to other incredible meals we've had on the island. €6.50 for a bottle of water. €22 for a very mediocre cocktail. The view is nice but it's nice everywhere. Plenty of other restaurants about for better quality food and better value for money.

The location was great. We had the half grilled chicken and a chicken gyro. The chef clearly has skill, but the cuts of meat weren't the best. The chicken was fatty and a bit chewy. The sauces and flavoring were five star. The staff were friendly. Excellent patio.
